EigenLayer's Token Launch Draws Scrutiny Over Supply Concerns https://www.coindesk.com/business/2024/10/02/eigenlayers-token-launch-draws-scrutiny-over-supply-concerns/?utm_medium=referral&utm_source=rss&utm_campaign=headlines 7OAK72N3TNA5XKZHIULVHN5VDQ Oliver KnightIn some ways, the release of EigenLayer's native EIGEN token this week was as expected; price rapidly rose moments after it was listed on exchanges, leading to a period of price discovery that culminated in a 22% slide from it's momentary record high. But there appears to be a storm brewing behind the scenes, with several investors and community members calling foul on a lack of transparency over the token's supply.
